Title: Relates to 1,4-Dioxane levels
Summary: Relates to 1,4-Dioxane levels; requires the department of health and department of environmental conservation to establish a maximum contaminant level of 0.35 parts per billion for the presence of 1,4-Dioxane in public supplies of potable water, ground water and runoff water from a wastewater treatment plant or water supply treatment plant.
LawCode: Add ยง1100-b, Pub Health L; add ยง17-0307, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the environmental conservation law, in relation to 1,4-Dioxane levels
